thread.section_title: Residence Inn New York Manhattan/Times Square - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great location
thread.title_full: Great location - Review of Residence Inn New York Manhattan/Times Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Jenny M
title: Great location
text:
Easy check in. We were early, so our bags were minded in a secure room.
The hotel is near to everything - Times Square and all the places you would expect to see. We used the Subway most of the time which took a little while to work out, but in the end we used it each day.
There was no kettle in the room which perplexed us at first. Just use the microwave to heat up cups of water. No problem.
There are fresh food markets nearby, so it's easy to find really good food to prepare for yourself if you want to.
One hint about the breakfast. It is buffet style. Get there EARLY! If not, you will have to queue and the floor gets very dirty and messy, but it is magically cleaned up by lunchtime. In the early evening there is happy hour, with half price drinks.
All in all a good place to stay.
We caught a cab to and from the Airport - my advice would be to do this because the New York cab drivers are very good and know their stuff!
Room Tip: Ask for a corner room - they are bigger See more room tips
